description: Chapter 70.285 RCW and Chapter 173-901 WAC requires manufacturers to certify brake friction material sold in Washington State by January 1, 2015.  This data set contains a list of all edge codes that have been certified with Ecology.  Manufacturers are required to submit certification forms quarterly.  This dataset will be updated each quarter.

metadata.attribution: The Washington State Department of Ecology

name: Better Brakes - List of Certified Parts
